meanings.definition: A mixture or blend of different elements
meanings.sent1: The cake batter was an amalgam of flour, sugar, and eggs.
meanings.sent2: The artist created an amalgam of colors on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The amalgam of flavors in the soup surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was an amalgam of kindness and determination.
meanings.sent5: The garden was an amalgam of flowers, herbs, and vegetables.

meanings.definition: A combination of diverse elements into a unified whole
meanings.sent1: The team's victory was an amalgam of hard work and strategy.
meanings.sent2: The novel was an amalgam of romance, mystery, and adventure.
meanings.sent3: The amalgam of talents in the band made their music unique.
meanings.sent4: His speech was an amalgam of humor and sincerity.
meanings.sent5: The painting was an amalgam of different art styles.
